products.productdescription:
The elegant silver or white fascia and side channels house roller fabric discreetly within the roof window.  Skye roof blinds have been designed to fit Velux, Rooflite, Keylite, Fakro and Dakstra roof windows.  Offering optimum light control each blind can be positioned effortlessly to sit at any desired point within the side channels.

All parts are supplied to fit the blind direct to your choice of branded skylight window.

products.title: Meadow Flower asc Redcurrant Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Made to measure Meadow Flower asc Redcurrant Perfect Fit Pleated Blind PX80012. An elegant, dim-out pleated blind made with an asc, solar reflective, backing.
products.productdescription: Part of our Meadow Flower range, where Advanced Solar Control (asc) creates a perfect solution for any room, reducing the sun's glare whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The ‘ASC’ refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the Summer and retaining heat in the Winter. The metallic reflective backing is therefore on the reverse of the fabric, facing towards the window.  This perfect fit blind is produced in a single cell fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, UPVC windows and doors.  This is a single-cell fabric, the guide wires will be exposed meaning that there will be visible holes allowing light to come through. These can be seen on our range of images above.  If you would prefer the wires to be hidden, please take a look at our 'Hive' or 'Luna' ranges.

products.title: Primary Red Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: This Primary Red Perfect Fit Blind, is a combination of our metal venetian blind and perfect fit frame to create an ideal blind for your UPVC windows and doors. No screws, no drilling - innovative fixings.

products.title: Fired Walnut Real Wood
products.metadescription: Made to measure Fired Walnut Wood Venetian blinds are part of our large range of Sunwood wooden venetian blinds.
products.productdescription: Our premium quality Sunwood range of Blinds are one of the leading Wooden Venetian Blind brands in the UK market - we are confident you will not buy better quality blinds, backed by our 3 Year Guarantee. All blinds are sent with installation instructions, universal bracket (top fix, side fix or face fix) and a Pelmet fascia to sit on the front of the blind headrail.

products.title: Stirlo Scarlett Red
products.metadescription: Made to Measure Stirlo Scarlett Red Roller Blind | Privacy, Dim-Out Fabric | blindsbypost
products.productdescription: Stirlo Scarlett Red Plain Roller Blind The Stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room.  The fabric is composed of 100% Polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with White chain used as standard, or a Nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing. If   the width and the drop are greater than 1800mm, the fabric may be joined either by a stitch or weld dependant on our professional discretion.

products.title: Quartz Red Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Quartz Red Metal Perfect Fit Blind, is a combination of our metal venetian blind and perfect fit frame to create an ideal blind for your UPVC windows and doors. No screws, no drilling - innovative fixings.

products.title: Konya Blackout Scarlett Red
products.metadescription: Made to Measure Konya Blackout Scarlett Red Roller Blind | Privacy, Thermal Fabric | blindsbypost
products.productdescription: Konya Blackout Scarlett Red Plain Roller Blind The Konya range boasts a huge range of blackout and thermal fabrics to use in any room. The fabric is composed of 100% Polyester, with a PVC blackout backing and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with White chain used as standard, or a Nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing. If both the width and the drop are greater than 1800mm, the fabric may be joined either by a stitch or weld dependant on our professional discretion.
